procedure.title: Configuring a standalone &agentabbrev;
procedure.para: To configure an already installed standalone &agentabbrev;, perform the following steps.

step.para: Select Local Settings, and configure the &agentabbrev; as needed for your environment.

After modifying its configuration, you have to restart the syslog-ng Agent service for the changes to take effect. To restart the &agentabbrev; service, select Start Menu > Run enter services.msc and restart the syslog-ng Agent service.
